RouteDescription = #{routedescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update Ord_OrderInfo set RouteID = #{routeid,jdbcType=CHAR}, TourID = #{tourid,jdbcType=CHAR}, OrderName = #{ordername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ScheduleDays = #{scheduledays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Category = #{category,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OrderType = #{ordertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TourDate = #{tourdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ReturnDate = #{returndate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DepName = #{depname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DestName = #{destname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DestID = #{destid,jdbcType=CHAR}, OrderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CustomerUnitID = #{customerunitid,jdbcType=CHAR}, CustomerName = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrderSourceID = #{ordersourceid,jdbcType=CHAR}, OrderSource = #{ordersource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HasTraffic = #{hastraffic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AdjustAmt = #{adjustamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ReceivableAmt = #{receivableamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PayableAmt = #{payableamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AdultNum = #{adultnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ChildNum = #{childnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GuideNum = #{guidenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreatedDate = #{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreatedBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreatedByID = #{createdbyid,jdbcType=CHAR}, DeptID = #{deptid,jdbcType=CHAR}, RevisedDate = #{reviseddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RevisedBy = #{revisedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrgID = #{orgid,jdbcType=CHAR}, OrgName = #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DataStatus = #{datastatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SignStatus = #{signstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SignType = #{signtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TourGuide = #{tourguide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SupplierID = #{supplierid,jdbcType=CHAR}, SupplierName = #{suppliername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SiteID = #{siteid,jdbcType=CHAR}, OccupiedPeriod = #{occupiedperiod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SingleOrderTypeID = #{singleordertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SingleOrderType = #{singleordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ServiceStandard = #{servicestandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PrivComment = #{privcomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrdComment = #{ordcomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AjustComment = #{ajustcomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TicketStatus = #{ticketstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RouteTypeID = #{routetypeid,jdbcType=CHAR}, RouteTypeName = #{routetypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CustomerUnitType = #{customerunittype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IsSignCost = #{issigncost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DepID = #{depid,jdbcType=CHAR}, ProType = #{protype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProTypeID = #{protypeid,jdbcType=CHAR}, IsCreditPay = #{iscreditpay,jdbcType=BIT}, CreditPayDate = #{creditpaydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PayStatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EntrySourceID = #{entrysourceid,jdbcType=CHAR}, EntrySource = #{entrysource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrderSaler = #{ordersaler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrderSalerID = #{ordersalerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, AirportService = #{airportservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SalerDeptID = #{salerdeptid,jdbcType=CHAR}, SalerDeptName = #{salerdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HasTourist = #{hastourist,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IsAutoConfirmed = #{isautoconfirmed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OrigReceivableAmt = #{origreceivableamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OrigPayableAmt = #{origpayableamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ParentOrgID = #{parentorgid,jdbcType=CHAR}, IsDirectOrgan = #{isdirectorgan,jdbcType=BIT}, NoTouristComment = #{notouristcomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsUseDiscount = #{isusediscount,jdbcType=BIT}, PriceType = #{pricetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ProdutOuterTimes = #{produtoutertimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NoTurnPayableAmt = #{noturnpayableamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OrderBusinessSource = #{orderbusinesssource,jdbcType=CHAR}, TurnBeforeCategory = #{turnbeforecategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ExtendedStatus = #{extendedstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DirectSalesSendID = #{directsalessendid,jdbcType=CHAR}, RouteSubType = #{routesubtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, RouteSubTypeName = #{routesubtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ChangeStatus = #{changestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TeamNature = #{teamnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsSigned = #{issigned,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SendTime = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SignTime = #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IsShopOrderManage = #{isshopordermanage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ProductType = #{producttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RouteDescription = #{routedescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT (1) FROM Pro_Product p, Ord_OrderInfo o, Pro_Tour pt WHERE pt.id = o.TourID AND p.id = pt.ProID AND o.CreatedByID = #{createId} AND (p.AliaseName LIKE '%${condition}%' OR o.OrderNo LIKE '%${condition}%' OR p.ProNo LIKE '%${condition}%' ) ) AS totalNum, o.ID as ordId, p.id AS proId, pt.ID AS proTourId, p.AliaseName AS aliaseName, o.OrderNo AS orderNo, o.TourDate AS tourDate, o.AdultNum AS adultNum, o.ChildNum AS childNum, p.TourDays AS tourDays, o.PayableAmt AS payableAmt, p.CoverImg AS coverImg, o.ReturnDate as returnDate, o.DataStatus as dataStatus FROM Pro_Product p, Ord_OrderInfo o, Pro_Tour pt WHERE pt.id = o.TourID AND p.id = pt.ProID AND o.CreatedByID = #{createId} AND (p.AliaseName LIKE '%${condition}%' OR o.OrderNo LIKE '%${condition}%' OR p.ProNo LIKE '%${condition}%' ) ORDER BY o.CreatedDate DESC OFFSET #{startPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE Ord_OrderInfo set DataStatus = -1 WHERE id = #{orderId}
UPDATE Ord_OrderInfo set DataStatus = -2 WHERE id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT o.ID as ordId, o.OrderNo AS orderNo, o.TourDate AS tourDate, o.AdultNum AS adultNum, o.ChildNum AS childNum, o.PayableAmt AS payableAmt, o.ReturnDate as returnDate, o.DataStatus as dataStatus, o.Contact as contact, o.Mobile as mobile, o.CreatedDate as createdDate, o.SupplierName as supplierName, o.OrderName as aliaseName FROM Ord_OrderInfo o WHERE o.id=#{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Ord_OrderInfo SET DataStatus = 3, IsCreditPay = 0, NewOrderStatus = 12, CreditPayDate = GETDATE() WHERE id = #{orderId}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ID AS ordId , --总条数begin (SELECT count(*) FROM Ord_OrderInfo AS a LEFT JOIN Pro_Tour AS b ON a.TourID = b.ID LEFT JOIN Pro_Product AS c ON a.RouteID = c.ID --包含待确认的已收款 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OrderID , SUM(a.CollectAmt) CollectAmt , OrgID FROM Ord_Order_Collection a WHERE a.CollectStatus != 3 AND ISNULL(a.Isbuyerapply,0)!=1 GROUP BY OrderID , a.OrgID ) AS d ON a.ID = d.OrderID AND a.OrgID = d.OrgID --已经付款 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OrderID , OrgID , SUM(a.Amount) Amount FROM dbo.Fin_OrderCostPaid a WHERE a.DataStatus = 2 GROUP BY a.OrderID , a.OrgID ) AS e ON a.ID = e.OrderID AND a.OrgID = e.OrgID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(a.InvoiceAmt) InvoiceAmt , a.OrderID FROM [Ord_Order_Invoice_Item] AS a LEFT JOIN Ord_Order_Invoice AS b ON a.InvoiceID = b.ID WHERE b.InvoiceStatus = 2 GROUP BY a.OrderID ) AS invoce ON invoce.OrderID = a.ID WHERE 1=1 ) AS totalNum , --总条数end a.RouteID AS proId , a.TourID AS proTourId , a.OrderName AS aliaseName, a.TourDate AS tourDate , c.TourDays AS tourDays , c.coverImg AS coverImg , a.ReturnDate AS returnDate , a.DestName AS destName , a.OrderNo AS orderNo, a.Contact AS contact , a.Mobile AS mobile , a.ReceivableAmt , a.PayableAmt AS payableAmt, a.AdultNum AS adultNum, a.ChildNum AS childNum, a.CreatedDate AS createdDate, a.DataStatus AS dataStatus , ISNULL(e.Amount, 0) AS PaidAmount, a.SupplierName AS supplierName, a.SupplierID AS supplierID FROM Ord_OrderInfo AS a LEFT JOIN Pro_Tour AS b ON a.TourID = b.ID LEFT JOIN Pro_Product AS c ON a.RouteID = c.ID --包含待确认的已收款 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OrderID , SUM(a.CollectAmt) CollectAmt , OrgID FROM Ord_Order_Collection a WHERE a.CollectStatus != 3 AND ISNULL(a.Isbuyerapply,0)!=1 GROUP BY OrderID , a.OrgID ) AS d ON a.ID = d.OrderID AND a.OrgID = d.OrgID --已经付款 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT OrderID , OrgID , SUM(a.Amount) Amount FROM dbo.Fin_OrderCostPaid a WHERE a.DataStatus = 2 GROUP BY a.OrderID , a.OrgID ) AS e ON a.ID = e.OrderID AND a.OrgID = e.OrgID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(a.InvoiceAmt) InvoiceAmt , a.OrderID FROM [Ord_Order_Invoice_Item] AS a LEFT JOIN Ord_Order_Invoice AS b ON a.InvoiceID = b.ID WHERE b.InvoiceStatus = 2 GROUP BY a.OrderID ) AS invoce ON invoce.OrderID = a.ID WHERE 1=1
order BY a.RevisedDate desc OFFSET #{startPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.sql:
AND (a.OrderName LIKE '%${condition}%' or a.OrderNo LIKE '%${condition}%' )
--B端
and a.OrgID = #{orgId} AND a.Category in(4,6)
--C端
AND a.CreatedByID = #{userId} AND a.Category in(7,5,8)
--商城订单 --1：商城采购 2：内部下单 3：手工录单 4：微店erp用户 5：微店直客 6：pc商城B端用户 7：pc商城C端用户
--待确认0 待支付 1，2 支付待确认3 已支付4 已取消-1
AND a.DataStatus = 0
AND a.DataStatus in(1,2)
AND a.DataStatus in(3,10)
AND a.DataStatus = 4
AND a.DataStatus = -1

AND (a.OrderName LIKE '%${condition}%' or a.OrderNo LIKE '%${condition}%' )
AND a.OrderSalerID =#{userId} AND a.Category = 8 AND a.SupplierID = #{orgId}
AND a.DataStatus = 0
AND a.DataStatus in(1,2)
AND a.DataStatus in(3,10)
AND a.DataStatus = 4
AND a.DataStatus = -1
mapper.update: UPDATE Ord_OrderInfo SET DataStatus = 10, IsCreditPay = 1, NewOrderStatus = 13, CreditPayDate = GETDATE() WHERE id = #{orderId}
mapper.select:
SELECT DataStatus as dataStatus, COUNT (*) as orderNum FROM Ord_OrderInfo WHERE OrgID = #{orgId} AND Category in(4,6)
AND (OrderName LIKE '%${condition}%' or OrderNo LIKE '%${condition}%' )
GROUP BY DataStatus
SELECT COUNT (OrderNo) FROM Ord_OrderInfo WHERE OrderNo = #{orderNumber}
